title: Pediatric Scores Plus
description: Pediatric Scores Plus: Application that compiles over 70 scores and utilities of Pediatrics. The result of the score can be notified, saved or sent by email. Categories • Newborn: APGAR, SILVERMAN, CRIB, SHOCK    Gestational age: CAPURRO, CAPURRO ACOG, BALLARD    Hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy: HIE, FATES, THOMPSON, SARNAT    Sepsis: RODWELL    Abstinence syndrome: FINNEGAN • Pain: PIPP, NIPS, EDIN, SUN, NFCS, CRIES, FLACC, EVANS, CHEOPS, OPS, FACES, WALCO & HOWITE • Trauma: PTS • Coma: GCS infants and children, RAIMONDI • Sedation: COMFORT, RAMSAY, RAMSAY-MILLER, RASS, SBS • Postanesthetic: ALDRETE, STEWARD • Abstinence syndrome: WAT-1, SOS • Upper airway: OAG, WESTLEY, TAUSSIG, MCISAAC • Lower airway: ARF/TAL, WOOD, DOWNES, WOOD-DOWNES, WOOD-DOWNES FERRÉS, HSJD, ABSS, PS • Cardiology: NYHA, LQTS, SQTS, ROSS, ROSS HFC • Dehydration: GORELICK, WHO, CDS • Fever: YIOS, YALE • Meningitis: BOYER, NIGROVIC • Appendicitis: PAS, ALVARADO • Ulcers: NSRAS, BRADEN Q • Mortality: CRIB, PELOD, PRISM III, PIM 2, PIM 3 • Transport: PETP For example: Apgar Score (with 5 minutes’ notice); Test of Silverman; Capurro Method and The New Ballard Score to determine the gestational age,… Utilities • Holliday-Segar Formula • Body Surface Area • Estimated Blood Volume • Permissible Blood Loss • Glomerular Filtration Rate • Endotracheal Tube and Umbilical Catheter • Calculated QT Interval Corrected • Dextrose IV Fluid • Glucose Serum • Glucose Delivery It is the improved version of Pediatrics Scores with Material Design. Languages: English / French / Spanish / Portuguese A great help in PICU!
descriptionHTML:
Pediatric Scores Plus: Application that compiles over 70 scores and utilities of Pediatrics.


The result of the score can be notified, saved or sent by email.



Categories

• Newborn: APGAR, SILVERMAN, CRIB, SHOCK

   Gestational age: CAPURRO, CAPURRO ACOG, BALLARD

   Hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy: HIE, FATES, THOMPSON, SARNAT

   Sepsis: RODWELL

   Abstinence syndrome: FINNEGAN

• Pain: PIPP, NIPS, EDIN, SUN, NFCS, CRIES, FLACC, EVANS, CHEOPS, OPS, FACES, WALCO & HOWITE

• Trauma: PTS

• Coma: GCS infants and children, RAIMONDI

• Sedation: COMFORT, RAMSAY, RAMSAY-MILLER, RASS, SBS

• Postanesthetic: ALDRETE, STEWARD

• Abstinence syndrome: WAT-1, SOS

• Upper airway: OAG, WESTLEY, TAUSSIG, MCISAAC

• Lower airway: ARF/TAL, WOOD, DOWNES, WOOD-DOWNES, WOOD-DOWNES FERRÉS, HSJD, ABSS, PS

• Cardiology: NYHA, LQTS, SQTS, ROSS, ROSS HFC

• Dehydration: GORELICK, WHO, CDS

• Fever: YIOS, YALE

• Meningitis: BOYER, NIGROVIC

• Appendicitis: PAS, ALVARADO

• Ulcers: NSRAS, BRADEN Q

• Mortality: CRIB, PELOD, PRISM III, PIM 2, PIM 3

• Transport: PETP




For example: Apgar Score (with 5 minutes’ notice); Test of Silverman; Capurro Method and The New Ballard Score to determine the gestational age,…



Utilities

• Holliday-Segar Formula

• Body Surface Area

• Estimated Blood Volume

• Permissible Blood Loss

• Glomerular Filtration Rate

• Endotracheal Tube and Umbilical Catheter

• Calculated QT Interval Corrected

• Dextrose IV Fluid

• Glucose Serum

• Glucose Delivery


It is the improved version of Pediatrics Scores with Material Design.



Languages: English / French / Spanish / Portuguese



A great help in PICU!
summary: Compilation of scores, scales, tests and classifications grouped by category
